description.ko: 기하학적 유리 프리즘을 통해 빛이 생생한 스펙트럼으로 분산되는 찰나의 순간을 포착하여 광학적 아름다움을 극대화한 시각 자료입니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing display of optical physics, capturing the precise moment light splits into a vivid spectral array through a geometric glass prism.

prompt: A macro close-up of a high-clarity triangular crystal prism refracting a single beam of pure white light into a vibrant, detailed rainbow spectrum. Sharp caustic patterns on a minimalist white surface, ethereal lighting, soft bokeh background, 8k resolution, cinematic composition, hyper-realistic glass textures.
